meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sunny.
meanings.sent1: The sunniness of the day brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent2: I love the sunniness of summer days, it makes me feel so happy.
meanings.sent3: Her constant sunniness can be a bit overwhelming at times, but it's infectious.
meanings.sent4: The sunniness of her disposition was like a ray of light in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The sunniness of his outlook on life was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Brightness or radiance from the sun.
meanings.sent1: The sunniness of the sky was blinding as we walked outside.
meanings.sent2: The sunniness of the day made everything look so vibrant and alive.
meanings.sent3: The intense sunniness of the desert made it hard to see without sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: The sunniness of her smile lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The sunniness of the sunrise painted the sky in beautiful hues.
